name: Anchor on objective criteria
summary: Shift the conversation from positions to objective standards (market, precedents, benchmarks) and invite agreement on those standards first.
goal: Increase legitimacy and reduce friction by negotiating on standards, not personalities.
counterparty_guidance: Test whether the criteria are relevant and comparable.
Offer alternative benchmarks or data sources.
Anchor your response to your own objective metrics.
